H6 Future Flight Deck

P Flight deck design is a multi-faceted problem - aspects to consider include interface technologies, ergonomics, materials technology, crew resource management, workflow and process, and full system architecture design. Paired with a safety critical, highly regulated, technology constrained industry, it is a fascinating, complex and sometimes difficult discipline to research and develop new technologies for.

P-small Flight deck design is a multi-faceted problem - aspects to consider include interface technologies, ergonomics, materials technology, crew resource management, workflow and process, and full system architecture design. Paired with a safety critical, highly regulated, technology constrained industry, it is a fascinating, complex and sometimes difficult discipline to research and develop new technologies for.
